message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
